title: Portraits
description: Community portraits capturing the faces and personalities of Chicago's lowrider culture. From car show enthusiasts to families, these portraits celebrate the people behind the vehicles.

items.title: Woman at Car Show - Sunglasses
items.description: Stylish woman portrait at car show wearing sunglasses with Chicago skyline backdrop

items.title: Woman in Red Dress - Car Interior
items.description: Elegant woman in red dress posing in lowrider car interior with gold steering wheel

items.title: Black and White Couple Portrait
items.description: Intimate black and white portrait of couple with lowrider in background

items.title: Man Portrait with Lowrider Truck
items.description: Strong male portrait posed with custom lowrider truck in daylight

items.title: Woman with Heart-Shaped Glasses
items.description: Fun and playful woman portrait wearing heart-shaped glasses at car show

items.title: Woman with Tattoos - Night Portrait
items.description: Artistic night portrait of woman with visible tattoos and moody lighting

items.title: Woman with Yellow Lowrider
items.description: Woman posing with bright yellow lowrider in daylight setting

items.title: Man in Dodgers Shirt
items.description: Street style portrait of man wearing Dodgers shirt with car show backdrop

items.title: Woman with Hat - Artistic Portrait
items.description: Artistic portrait of woman wearing hat with artistic face composition

items.title: Man at Car Show
items.description: Black and white portrait of man at car show with serious expression

items.title: Woman with Red Flower
items.description: Beautiful portrait of woman with red flower in hair and neon lights

items.title: Group of Women at Event
items.description: Group portrait of women posing together at car show event with tropical backdrop

items.title: Man Holding Child

items.description: Fun and vibrant portrait of woman wearing colorful glasses at event
